alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:47PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 330 PM MST... At 246 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm near Hickiwan, or 22 miles east of Ajo, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Gu Vo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, San Simon, Why, Charco 27, Gunsight, Kuakatch and San Simon West. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 59. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
